name: Yuan-ti Mind Whisperer
proficiencies: Saving Throw: WIS +4 | Saving Throw: CHA +5 | Skill: Deception +5 | Skill: Stealth +4
senses: Darkvision 120 ft. (penetrates magical darkness) | Passive Perception 12

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger.
special_abilities.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).
special_abilities.desc: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
special_abilities.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Mind Fangs (2/Day).
special_abilities.desc: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) psychic damage to the target.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).
special_abilities.desc: The yuan-ti is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

special_abilities.name: Sseth’s Blessing.
special_abilities.desc: When the yuan-ti reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the yuan-ti gains 9 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only).
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

actions.name: Bite.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only).
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
